long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Moderm 2024 Calculator - Calculator and Calorie Calculation Tool
 *
 * This calculator and calorie calculation tool provides users with the ability to perform basic
 * mathematical operations and calculate daily calorie needs. The user-friendly interface makes
 * calculations easy and straightforward.
 *
 * Features:
 * - Basic mathematical operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
 * - Calorie calculation feature
 * - User-friendly interface
 *
 * Usage:
 * - Perform basic mathematical operations by clicking on the respective buttons or using keyboard input.
 * - For calorie calculation, enter the calorie values of foods, and the tool will display the total calories.
 *
 * Note: This tool is designed for simple calculations and calorie estimations. More complex calculations
 * should be performed using professional tools.
 *
 * Developer: mobimod
 * Version: 1.0
